name: Red and Black
description:
***Warning, we forgot to put in a quit button so if you launch the prototype you will need to quit via task manager***

Red and Black is a neo-noir shooter/puzzle game set in a neo-noir Las Vegas. The player takes on the role of a hitwoman named Red, who comes out of retirement when the Patience Syndicate kidnaps her love, Lily, while being assisted by a mysterious entity known as The Dealer. The player utilizes Reds killer skills to navigate the world, blasting her way through the streets, casinos, and mob joints of fabulous Las Vegas, but with the deck stacked against her, she and the player will need to use the Dealer’s power to even the odds…or bust out.
